articles.author: Canadian Press
articles.title: New Brunswick to lift remaining COVID-19 restrictions, but experts warn of relapse - Vancouver Is Awesome
articles.description: HALIFAX — As New Brunswick prepares to drop all of its COVID-19 restrictions on Friday night, some infectious disease experts are warning the province should prepare for a surge in cases this fall because of the highly contagious Delta variant.
